code: import React from'react';import{useShoppingCart}from'../contexts/ShoppingCartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const formatPrice=price=>{return price.toFixed(2).replace('.',',');};const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const{addToCart}=useShoppingCart();const handleAddToCart=()=>{addToCart(product);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"product-image",src:product.image,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"product-name",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"product-price",children:[formatPrice(product.price)," \u20AC"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"product-add-button",onClick:handleAddToCart,children:"A\xF1adir al carrito"})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
